mapper.insert:
insert into bot_sentence_process (process_id, template_id, template_name, template_type, version, industry, account_no, old_process_id, crt_time, crt_user, lst_update_time, lst_update_user, `state`, approve_time, approve_user, approve_notes) VALUES
( (SELECT genTabId('bot_sentence_process') AS processId), #{item.templateId}, #{item.templateName}, #{item.templateType}, #{item.version}, #{item.industry}, #{item.accountNo}, #{item.oldProcessId}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.crtUser}, #{item.lstUpdateTime}, #{item.lstUpdateUser}, #{item.state}, #{item.approveTime}, #{item.approveUser}, #{item.approveNotes} )

SELECT genTabId('bot_sentence_process')
insert into bot_sentence_process (process_id, template_id, template_name, template_type, version, industry, account_no, old_process_id, crt_time, crt_user, lst_update_time, lst_update_user, `state`, approve_time, approve_user, approve_notes) values (#{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lstUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
